A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I couldn't be happier with this installment.   Rian zigged when the fanboys thought he would zag.   It definitely went in a new direction which I loved.  Lots of humor\, tension and emotion.   A worthy entry into the Star Wars library.  Its certainly a long movie and probably could have 10 minutes trimmed\, but thats a minor gripe.  Be prepared to be surprised.  If you like your Star Wars to follow a predictable plot\, you may be disappointed.  If you have an open mind\, then this is one of the best Star Wars movies ever.
